ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class CameraAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.CameraAdapter

  • public class CameraAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    This function deals with calling the camera intent and dealing with its output in a fashion similar to an adapter.
    Author:
    James Cadek
